summary: Fairy tale about young cobbler Jíra, who had fashioned wings from leather in order to rescue princess Jasnenka from the tower of the royal castle, where her father had closed her to to save her from the evil witch and her daughter Cernava.
cast: Michaela Kuklová|Jan Potmesil|Lubor Tokos|Antonie Hegerlíková|Jaroslav Cejka|Helena Ruzicková|Yvetta Blanarovicová|Otto Sevcík|Venuse Humhey|Zdenek Podhurský|Václav Kankovský|Vladimír Huber|Josef Vaidis|Karel Belohradský|Stanislav Tríska|Oleg Dupal|Jiri Postranecky|Dusan Vodák|Ivo Cerný|Lenka Vejmanová|David Voverka|Ondrej Starý|Vlastimila Vlková|Vladimír Svabík|Miroslav Grác
title: O princezne Jasnence a létajícím sevci
